    • Uses of AnalyzerInterface in ch.linetic.analysis

      Classes in ch.linetic.analysis that implement AnalyzerInterface 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Analyzer
      Abstract implementation of the AnalyzerInterface As all the analyzers has a lot in common, the abstract class is a helper class that all concrete analyzer should extends from.

    • Uses of AnalyzerInterface in ch.linetic.analysis.analyzers

      Classes in ch.linetic.analysis.analyzers that implement AnalyzerInterface 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ClapAnalyzer
      Analyze the hand gesture "clap" Analyze by steps, when we reach the last state (i.e. 100%), it means that the clap has been recognize
      class  HandShakinessAnalyzer
      Analyze the shakiness of the hands MIN_VALUE and MAX_VALUE can be adjust for different sensitivity
      class  HandsProximityAnalyzer
      Analyze the proximity of the hands MIN_VALUE and MAX_VALUE can be adjust to modify the zone where the hands are considered as close to each other
      class  MultiplicityAnalyzer
      Analyze the multiplicity of the movement i.e.
      class  OrientationAnalyzer
      Analyze the orientation of the body 0% means that the person is facing the kinect 100 means that the person is oriented 90 degrees on the right or on the left
      class  ShakinessAnalyzer
      Analyze the shakiness of the whole body MIN_VALUE and MAX_VALUE can be adjust for different sensitivity
      class  SpeedAnalyzer
      Analyze the speed of the movement i.e. analyze the average of the distance of all joints of the body and then average those values as well.
